input:
Write an ad for the following product

Product: Qoola is a versatile wearable device that provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time. It stainless technology creates air with a wide range of temperature for all four seasons. Its air purification function clean the air by removing various pollutants in the air. Negative Air Ions technology to provide you with great air quality.

Tone: informative, tech, savvy, serious

Audience: Residents in metropolitan areas
sentences: Looking for a versatile device to keep you comfortable all year round? Look no further than Qoola! This device provides air conditioning and air purification functions, making it the perfect choice for those who live in metropolitan areas.

Qoola is the perfect solution for residents in metropolitan areas who are looking for a versatile device that provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time. With its stainless technology, Qoola creates air with a wide range of temperature for all four seasons. And its Negative Air Ions technology removes various pollutants in the air to provide you with great air quality.

Qoola is a versatile wearable device that provides air conditioning and air purification functions at the same time. It stainless technology creates air with a wide range of temperature for all four seasons. Its air purification function clean the air by removing various pollutants in the air.
